title: The Aussie sandwich
ingredients: ['2 egg yolks', '1 teaspoon dijon mustard', '1 pinch salt', '300ml olive oil', '1 clove garlic, finely grated', '1/2 lemon, juice only', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 focaccia', '1 avocado, sliced', '1 beef tomato, sliced into 3 discs', '1 carrot, grated', '1 bunch watercress, stalks removed', '1/2 beetroot, peeled and grated', '1/4 green pepper, thinly sliced', '1 red chilli', 'basil']
